title: (x) Revolution - Black Serif Font - Bernhard MT Condensed {Mike F}
author: Sant10

comments.content:
Thanks,

Can someone tell me a free font similar to that?

This isn't the right place to ask that. For one thing there are a lot of font designers here, or people who want to support them. Looking for free copies of commercial fonts is frowned on here.

- Mike Yanega

Fernando - If your goal was to get something similar that's free, your best bet would have been to go directly to dafont.com and look through the Basic -\> Serif category. Maybe something there will work for you. It won't be at all a match for Bernard MT Condensed - which costs money.
